title: Bug 12398 - Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398 - Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not activate any functionality.
EB: The tab key should be able to navigate through the interactive elements in the Help view without the need for an initial click.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Use the tab key to navigate through the interactive elements.
Expected result: The tab key should activate each interactive element in sequence.
